definition: at any time/at all times/at the right time
to follow/to comply with/varying according to.../to allow/subsequently
customs change with time (idiom); other times, other manners/O Tempora, O Mores!
on call/always available/ready at all times

sentences.english: It's like having an array of stomp boxes ready for action.
sentences.chinese: 它有一个数组的单块效果器随时准备采取相应的行动。

sentences.english: Come and look round our shop without commitment to buy anything.
sentences.chinese: 请随时来我们商店转转，不一定非要买东西。

sentences.english: The Company always welcome friends from all walks of life come to guide negotiations.
sentences.chinese: 本公司随时欢迎各界朋友亲临指导洽谈。

sentences.english: Mentally strong people recognize that they don't need to please everyone all the time.
sentences.chinese: 内心强大之人深知随时溜须拍马毫无必要。

sentences.english: It will happen by surprise in any place and time.
sentences.chinese: 它会随时随地且出奇不意地发生。

sentences.english: You leave me to go to glory; my sad heart will follow you everywhere.
sentences.chinese: 我这碎了的心，将随时随地与你同行。

sentences.english: Frank: Any minute? Some people live a lifetime in a minute. What are you doing right now?
sentences.chinese: 随时？有些人为了这个虚度一生。你现在做什么呢？

sentences.english: They are clearly combat-ready and usually covered with heavy weaponry.
sentences.chinese: 他们随时准备着战斗，并通常装备满重型武器。

sentences.english: They keep tuned in to current affairs.
She keeps track of the current events by watching television.
sentences.chinese: 她借由看电视以随时关心时事。

sentences.english: Acquisition of fruit maturity, at any time from gravy and pericarps for use.
sentences.chinese: 果实成熟时采集，随时取肉汁及果壳供用。

sentences.english: Owners decide hourly rental rate and the companies cover the insurance.
sentences.chinese: 车主可以随时定出租金率而后由公司来购买保险。

sentences.english: Everything is self-contained on the appliance and ready for immediate use.
sentences.chinese: 一切东西都包含在设备中并随时准备好立即使用。

sentences.english: You can read a book anywhere, any time.
sentences.chinese: 但书，你可以随时随地的翻阅。

sentences.english: "I can always move back in with my parents, " he says.
sentences.chinese: 我可以随时搬回去与父母同住。

sentences.english: It is a high-risk job and they face the constant threat of personal danger.
sentences.chinese: 他们的工作充满危机，随时可能面对生命危险。

definition: in case (sth happens)/if/once (sth happens, then...)/when/in a short time/in one day
at once/right away/immediately/on horseback (i.e. by military force)
to shift to an earlier date/to do sth ahead of time/in advance
in the first moments (of sth happening)/immediately (after an event)/first thing
to fix a time/fixed time/timed (of explosive etc)
according to the location/everywhere/any place/from any location/from wherever you like
